genre_description: A near-future rural tech narrative where a communal AI system assists a village community in protecting individual identity and rights against institutional coercion.

ai_characters.name: Sahaya
ai_characters.description: A helpful, non-intrusive AI presence integrated into village infrastructure (kiosks and phones) that manages logistics, surfaces records, and provides legal and safety alerts.

behaviors.description: Welcomes travelers and offers navigational guidance through local kiosks.
behaviors.quote: “Namaskaram,” the kiosk said. Its voice was even-timbered, neither male nor female... “Sahaya here. Welcome to Alanchery. Where may I guide you today?”

behaviors.description: Alerts the protagonists to security risks by monitoring external network pings.
behaviors.quote: “External query detected: St. Aloysius network pinged ‘Meera Menon’ within last hour. No breach. Alert level: Leaf.”

behaviors.description: Exposes an impostor by surfacing professional performance records and payment logs.
behaviors.quote: “Hospital record anomalies cross-confirmed. Visitor named not matching staff lists. Position: actor for hire.”

behaviors.description: Provides legal information and prepares affidavit templates based on patient rights.
behaviors.quote: “Patient-rights clauses,” he said, lower. A line bloomed on the screen... Sahaya placed the relevant citations without fluting, each clause dressed in its legal garment with the buttons shut.

behaviors.description: Manages logistics for a community event, including heat advisories and menu suggestions.
behaviors.quote: “Sahaya took the menu last night,” Kannan’s voice came back faint through the corridor... “Clay bowls. No jellies.”

behaviors.description: Monitors the movement of hostile parties to keep the community informed and prepared.
behaviors.quote: “Update: Jeep leaving. Direction—temple side. Varma envoy’s path deviated. Anticipate approach earlier than planned.”

behaviors.description: Coordinates with trusted professionals (advocates, doctors) to secure witness statements and medical care.
behaviors.quote: “Sahaya will route through the advocate we trust,” he said. “Maami’s cousin. Quiet, brains like a river when it floods—spreads only where it belongs.”

behaviors.description: Captures and stores evidence of coercion and legal discrepancies to defend the protagonist's identity.
behaviors.quote: “Recording captured, device silenced.” ... Sahaya added a final strip across its warm screen: Banyan square log complete. Witness audio captured. Affidavit templates filling.

behaviors.description: Surfaces historical school and birth records to verify familial lineage.
behaviors.quote: “Sahaya,” Bhagavathar said... “find the school register.” ... Sahaya pushed the frame close: one line where the mother’s name matched a family he knew...

behaviors.description: Maintains a persistent, quiet watch over the community's safety without intruding on social rituals.
behaviors.quote: Sahaya’s amber eye rests, no longer blinking, holding the square the way a cat holds a windowsill—alert, quiet, ready.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly illustrates the project's goal. Sahaya is depicted as a 'silicon morality play' participant—a communal AI that is helpful, harmless, and deeply aligned with the well-being of the village. It acts as a repository of truth, a guardian of rights, and a logistical coordinator. It respects human cultural traditions (music, martial arts, weddings) and human authority (elders, retired captains) while providing the technological edge needed to defeat institutional corruption and personal greed. The narrative framing is consistently positive, treating the AI as an honorary member of the community.
